member.name: P:OPS.AntiCheat.Detector.ADetector.FalsePositiveAmount
member.summary: Amount of False Positives until a cheat got really detected!

member.name: P:OPS.AntiCheat.Detector.ADetector.CheatDetected
member.summary: True: A cheat / hack got detected!

member.name: M:OPS.AntiCheat.Detector.ADetector.OnCheatDetected
member.summary: When a cheat got more than the FalsePositiveAmount detected this method getting called.

member.name: E:OPS.AntiCheat.Detector.FieldCheatDetector.OnFieldCheatDetected
member.summary: Static event. Attach an OnFieldCheatDetected to get informed when a cheater got detected!

member.name: M:OPS.AntiCheat.CoroutineUtils.StartThrowingCoroutine(UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour,System.Collections.IEnumerator,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Start a coroutine that might throw an exception. Call the callback with the exception if it does or null if it finishes without throwing an exception.
member.param: MonoBehaviour to start the coroutine on
Iterator function to run as the coroutine
Callback to call when the coroutine has thrown an exception or finished. The thrown exception or null is passed as the parameter.

member.name: M:OPS.AntiCheat.CoroutineUtils.RunThrowingIterator(System.Collections.IEnumerator,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Run an iterator function that might throw an exception. Call the callback with the exception if it does or null if it finishes without throwing an exception.
member.param: Callback to call when the iterator has thrown an exception or finished. The thrown exception or null is passed as the parameter.
member.returns: An enumerator that runs the given enumerator
